description: Try our easy to follow Honey Soy Chicken Noodle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle stir-fry,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Honey Soy Chicken Noodle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Maggi Honey Soy Stir Fry
2 pkt Maggi 2 Minute Noodles Chicken Wholegrain

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chicken and MAGGI Honey Soy infusion paste in a medium bowl and set aside. Meanwhile cook 2 Minute Noodles following packet instructions; drain, rinse under cold water, set aside and keep warm.

Heat a large frying pan or wok over high heat, add oil and chicken, cook for 5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Add vegetables to pan, stir through and cook for 3 minutes or until vegetables are just tender.
Add reserved Maggi 2 Minute Noodles and Maggi Honey Soy finishing sauce, cook for a further 2 minutes or until heated through.
